sentence: there is a boy and his father and a boy in a green hoodie.
the boy in the green hoodie is sitting on a rock and sweating.
he is reaching for a bottle of water that the boy is handing to him.
the father is standing to the side with his hands on his hips.
the boy across the other rock has two water bottles in his hands.
the boy in the orange is holding a water bottle towards the boy.
there are other people on the rocks in the background.
the father has a bookbag on his back.
the boy in the green has one hand on the rock.
